body:
I want to know why is not updating the leaderboard, at least my ranking is not updating since 4 days ago :/
And in my profile, statistics never loads. It stays loading endlessly.
body_tagged:
I want to know why is not updating the leaderboard, at least my ranking is not updating since 4 days ago :/
And in my profile, statistics never loads. It stays loading endlessly.
title: Avicus web is not updating

replies.body: i believe this is getting fixed in the winter update
replies.body_tagged: i believe this is getting fixed in the winter update

replies.body:
It's not the leaderboards.
You're a new player and the AVN website makes new players's stats glitch, so, I believe you'll just have to wait to see your stats if you keep playing.
:(

replies.body: You can use avicus.net/Kou28/stats too see some of your stats.
replies.body_tagged: You can use avicus.net/Kou28/stats too see some of your stats.

replies.body: that worked, I can see my statistics now, thank you so much :)
